title: Malzahar di nuovo un mago

embed.description: Chemtech Tryndamere is spinning on to the PBE for testing! Here's Riot LoveStrut with a bugs & feedback thread for Chemtech Tryndamere: "This'll be a slaughter." Broken free from the Zaunite lab that's been holding him, Chemtech Tryndamere takes to the Rift to test the strengths of his newfound improvements.

body:
Call of the Void (Q)
Cast time lowered from .5 sec to .25 sec
[New] Post cast delay now .4 sec
AP ratio increased from 70% to 80%

Void Swarm (W) [Reworked]
Cost: 40/45/50/55/60
Cooldown: 8 sec
Cast Range: 150
Passive: Casting Malzahar's other spells gives him a stack of W (max 2)
Active: Summons a Voidling, plus additional Voidlings based on W stacks. Voidlings Basic Attacks deal magic damage, increased by 12/14/16/18/20 (+40% bonus AD)(+20% AP)
Voidling
Health increased from 3 to [65+8 per level]
201 at lvl 18
Attack Damage changed from [30/35/40/45/50 (+40% bonus AD) based on W rank] to [5 + 3.5 per level]
64.5 at lvl 18
Attack Speed changed from [.665 + 0% per level] to [0.665 +2% per level]
0.891 at lvl 18
Armor changed from 30 to [16 + 2 per level]
50 at lvl 18
Magic Resist changed from 50 to [8 + 1 per level]
25 at lvl 18
Gold value lowered from 5 to 2
Movement Speed lowered from 451 to 400
Duration lowered from 12 to 8/8/9/9/10\
[New] Tower and Champion Basic Attacks will kill Voidlings regardless of health, but otherwise incoming combat damage goes through standard Armor or Magic Resist calculations
[Removed] No longer gains 100% movement speed when running toward priority targets
[Removed] Movement speed is no longer affected by distance from Malzahar


Malefic Visions (E) AP ratio increased from 70% to 80%

Nether Grasp (R)
Null zone damage changed from [25/35/45% (+7.5% per 100 AP)] to [10/15/20% (+2.5% per 100 AP)]
[New] Beam now causes damage: 125/250/375 (+115% AP)


Riassunto rapido. Scala meglio con l'ap.
Gli aguotti fanno meno danni e si uccidono con un sol colpo se non sono in combattimento. La passiva della W ti fa summonare più aguotti alla volta se hai lanciato spell prima(Max 2)

Ebola(non quella di rengar XD) è di nuovo difficile da debellare.

LA ULTI HA DANNO FLAT CHE SCALA CON L'AP, più i danni della pozza diminuiti(i tank gioiscono)

Che dire, da ex main, mi piace.

replies.body: Quindi finalmente malz si ritirerà come allenatore di pokemon in botlane e diventerà un mago? Nice
